service.name: Forensic CPA AI
service.description: Forensic auditing tool for bank statements, credit cards, and Venmo - tracks money flow, flags suspicious patterns, and separates personal/business spending.
service.stop_command: kill $(ps aux | grep -E 'python.*(app|run).py' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}') 2>/dev/null || true
service.restart_command: kill $(ps aux | grep -E 'python.*(app|run).py' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}') 2>/dev/null; sleep 2; python3 app.py --port={PORT}
service.database_schema_overview: Tables: accounts, documents, transactions, categories, category_rules, audit_log, proof_links

database.schema_overview: Tables: accounts, documents, transactions, categories(25), category_rules(31), audit_log, proof_links
